channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mira Murati’s startup, Thinking Machines Lab, is losing two of its co-founders to OpenAI
item.description: The abrupt change in personnel was in the works for several weeks, according to an OpenAI executive.

item.title: Microsoft taps India’s Varaha for durable carbon removal offtake
item.description: Microsoft is buying over 100,000 tons of carbon dioxide removal credits from India's Varaha over the next three years.

item.title: India’s Emversity doubles valuation as it scales workers AI can’t replace
item.description: Emversity has raised $30 million in a new round as it scales job-ready training in India.

item.title: The FTC’s data-sharing order against GM is finally settled
item.description: The order, first proposed a year ago, bans GM from collecting and then selling geolocation data to third parties, like data brokers and insurance comp...

item.title: Neuroscientists Decipher Procrastination: A Brain Mechanism Explains Why People Leave Certain Tasks for Later
item.description: New research has discovered that a neural circuit may explain procrastination. Scientists were able to disrupt this connection using a drug.

item.title: Save Big on One of Our Favorite Desk Lamps from Lume Cube
item.description: Lume Cube has a variety of marked down lighting products to help revamp your home office.

item.title: AI models are starting to crack high-level math problems
item.description: Since the release of GPT 5.2, AI tools have become inescapable in high-level mathematics.

item.title: Netflix’s first original video podcasts feature Pete Davidson and Michael Irvin
item.description: As Netflix tries to take down YouTube’s dominance in the podcast space, it's getting new originals with Pete Davidson and Michael Irvin.

item.title: Musk denies awareness of Grok sexual underage images as California AG launches probe
item.description: The California attorney general has opened a formal investigation into Elon Musk's xAI after its chatbot Grok began generating nonconsensual sexual im...

item.title: App downloads declined again in 2025, but consumer spending soared to nearly $156B
item.description: Global app downloads were down, but consumer spending was up to nearly $156B in 2025.
